columns.name: I_REC_NO
columns.description: The record number primary key identifier for the tracking event specified.

columns.name: I_TRANSACTION_NO
columns.description: The transaction identifier for the shipment equipment of the tracking event.

columns.name: S_EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The shipment equipment GID linking an equipment record to the shipment.

columns.name: PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: The monthly range partition to manage purging status messages.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL
columns.description: The equipment initial is a mark that is registered with national or international authorities that is associated with a specific owner.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_NUMBER
columns.description: Number identifying the equipment used.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The Equipment Initial Number field is a concatenation of equipment initial and equipment number.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: An equipment type is a category of equipment. Oracle Transportation Management uses equipment types when it determines equipment capacity.

columns.name: INTERMODAL_EQUIPMENT_LENGTH
columns.description: The reported length of the equipment in the tracking event.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT
columns.description: The tare weight recorded on the tracking event for the shipment equipment.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The tare weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The tare weight unit of measure.

columns.name: SCALE_NAME
columns.description: The received volume recorded on the tracking event for the shipment ship unit.

columns.name: SCALE_LOCATION
columns.description: The scale location recorded for the tracking event.

columns.name: SCALE_TICKET
columns.description: Sequence ID printed on the scale ticket when weight is recorded.

columns.name: SCALE_WEIGHT
columns.description: The scale weight recorded on the tracking event for the shipment equipment.

columns.name: SCALE_WEIGHT_UOM_BASE
columns.description: The scale weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SCALE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The scale weight unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_QUALIFIER
columns.description: The type of weight that is represented by the scale weight; Estimate, Net, or Gross weight. E = Estimated, G = Gross, N = Net

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The equipment GID if the equipment is an asset managed in OTM.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The equipment reference number qualifier to identify an equipment entity for a tracking event.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_REFNUM_VALUE
columns.description: The equipment reference value associated with the equipment reference number qualifier.

columns.name: CHASSIS_INITIAL
columns.description: The chassis initial is a mark that is registered with national or international authorities that is associated with a specific owner

columns.name: CHASSIS_NUMBER
columns.description: Number identifying the used in conjunction with the equipment on the tracking event.

columns.name: CHASSIS_INITIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The Chassis Initial Number field is a concatenation of chassis initial and chassis number.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: S_EQUIPMENT_INDEX
columns.description: The standing order of the equipment on the shipment

columns.name: AAR_CAR_TYPE
columns.description: The AAR car type associated with the rail equipment on the tracking event.
